subject: Basketball
Lockouts
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: Commissioner David Stern once called himself Easy Dave, but while his current hard line with N.B.A. players might save the season, it could set loose the forces of chaos that wreck it instead.
snippet: Commissioner David Stern once called himself Easy Dave, but while his current hard line with N.B.A. players might save the season, it could set loose the forces of chaos that wreck it instead.
